title: Drawing, "A pair of trophies", 1770–80
medium:
Pen and black ink, brush and wash, black chalk on off-white laid paper.
(bordered in brush and black, blue watercolor on three sides)
description: Two trophies showing implements of war; the left one refers to the French cavalry, the right one to elements of artillery.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "A pair of trophies", 1770–80.
1770–80. Pen and black ink, brush and wash, black chalk on off-white laid paper.
(bordered in brush and black, blue watercolor on three sides). Gift of H. O. Havemeyer. 1907-13-6-2.
